level.heading: Section references
level.text: This section is referenced in § 8-1019 and § 8-1022.01.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 8-208
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-208, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-1019.

level.heading: Editor's notes
level.text: For present law, see Chapters 10B and 10C of this title.
